reviewText:
wow. A very thought provoking movie. I can't say more, for I have been left speechless. :)

A lot of people who would love this movie, probably never get to see it because its improperly categorized into the Shudder subscription and the cover picture is also misleading. I went into this thinking it would be a disturbing gory movie, but it was something else entirely. I enjoyed it.

Definitely one of the better low budget thriller movies. There were a few things that were a little strange such as ***spoilers ahead *** they spent a lot of time going through the different types of lights which ended up being pointless to the ending. Also, the CEO was way too strange for them not to suspect something about him and the whole thing with the lighter was pointless. Lastly, the pill being taken and him saying he knew about it made no sense ***end spoilers ***. But overall it was a good movie
This was an interesting movie to watch.  Though I'm not sure an experiment into the base human nature would go this far, history has proven that we are capable of terrible things.  I liked this.
Intense - Keep me wondering even until the end!
Very interesting whodunit / mind-bender / mystery movie. Very entertaining!
very good one.
Great movie, brings out the worst in human nature.
Very well written, good pace, unexpected ending. An enjoyable movie.

The movie was great. It provided suspense, it was intelligent, it certainly was not predictable. It kept me guessing and I was completely entertained. That is all I ask in a movie, entertain me, no matter what the genre.
I liked it
Every time you think you have it figured out there's another twist. It truly explores how people treat each other. Not much action but lots of physiological suspense.
It's a low-budget film that seriously exceeded my expectations. The twist was awesome.
Thanks

I love the locked room mystery genre. Exam kept me guessing and had me on the edge of my seat all the way up until the end. Every time I thought I had it figured out there would be a surprising twist. Extremely intelligent and well executed. Other similar films in this genre are Cube, Unknown and Kultur Shock!
Really liked this movie! Good character study. Keeps your interest the entire time.
Gotta see it.

Fantastic "locked-room mystery" slash "psychological thriller."  I normally find that the endings to these sorts of movies don't match the buildup, but I was extremely satisfied with this one.  Great script and performances.

I don't know who wrote those reviews they're quoting on the cover art, but its probably someone involved the production. Its not terrible. Itll have you imagining what you would do in the scenario. Its definitely bottom shelf for the genre, even the sub genre. With an ending that you cant really call a twist. Watch it if its free for you.
Not bad
Painful to watch. Turns out it is a 1st graders riddle!
Excellent
I thought it would be the same tired formula but it really kept me guessing.
